So I saw this out of curiosity and I thought this was a solid film. I don t understand why it s getting so many bad reviews It s clearly no 君の名は。 but it was pretty darn entertaining. The summer teen love scenario has been done to death in Japanese cinema but the time warp aspect of it really made me like it It wasn t a complete Edge of Tomorrow or Groundhog Day situation where the day repeats but only rewinding back the necessary moments. The main kid s feelings for the girl was really innocent and her curiosity for her drives the story. I like that His natural interest makes the girl more mysterious and charming. The girl initially I thought was sort of unlikable especially in the swimming pool scene but when you get to know her more it all makes sense. There were some dialog ue and scenarios that I thought were pretty edgy for a movie that was targeted for the teen crowd For example when you see your crush in school and you want to go to the bathroom you probably aren t going there to po op. I know what s happening 😏 😏. The an imation looked good for the most part There were moments where the fa cial designs would look like an adult when zoomed in but then look like a child when zoomed out That was sort of off putting. But for an an imation movie about the fireworks festival I really enjoyed this one It plays on a lot of fantasy but it worked for what the movie was going for.
